Uses of ISyncRuleHandle in com.ibm.team.interop.common
 

Subinterfaces of ISyncRuleHandle in com.ibm.team.interop.common
 interface ISyncRule
          A synchronization rule defines how external object properties and Jazz item properties are transformed into each other.
 

Methods in com.ibm.team.interop.common that return ISyncRuleHandle
 ISyncRuleHandle IExternalProxy.getSyncRuleHandle()
          Get a handle to the synchronization rule associated with this proxy, if any.
 

Methods in com.ibm.team.interop.common with parameters of type ISyncRuleHandle
 void IExternalProxy.setSyncRule(ISyncRuleHandle syncRule)
          Set the synchronization rule to use for this proxy (if none specified otherwise).
